title: Open Innovators
notes:
Welcome to the Mozilla Festival 2016 Open Innovators session notes.

Please feel welcome to ask questions and give feedback here.  Be kind, be polite, you know the drill.  If unsure check https://mozillafestival.org/guidelines

There's some extra information on this session here http://www.saunby.net/msaunby/2016/09/02/openinnov.html

The challenge question -

How can we, as fearless Mozillians, make an internet that is open and safe for everyone [and everything]?

Visit the platform to contribute ideas bit.ly/goMozillians
